title: Investors Beware: Stock Market Myths And Superstitions
description: On this Friday the 13th episode of IBD on Barron's Live, IBD’s Alissa Coram and Justin Nielsen are debunking stock market myths and superstitions. The market action in 2022 might seem like a horror show, but get ready for actionable takeaways and expert insights that'll help you steer clear of some common pitfalls.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
